Title: El-Kanz: El-Haqiqah wa el-Khayal 1
Actors: Muhammad Ramadhan, Muhammad Sad, Hend Sabry, Amina Khalil
Plot: The events revolve around four eras, namely the Pharaonic and Abbasid era and the Kingdom era. The events revolve around corruption and the level of some clerics through the ages on power ...
